thread.title: Theresa
thread.title_full: R&G Brenner Income Tax reviewed by Theresa

author: Theresa
title: Theresa
text: I called in the morning and was given an appointment for that day with the preparer that I have used the past few years. It took less than an hour and I got a refund larger than I expected. They charge much less than other tax preparers and the service is excellent.
